custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CPDefinition.CPDefinitionId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM CPDefinition LEFT JOIN CPDefinitionLocalization ON (CPDefinition.CPDefinitionId = CPDefinitionLocalization.cpDefinitionPK) WHERE (CPDefinition.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$])

SELECT CPDefinition.* , CPDefinitionLocalization.* FROM CPDefinition LEFT JOIN CPDefinitionLocalization ON (CPDefinition.CPDefinitionId = CPDefinitionLocalization.cpDefinitionPK) WHERE (CPDefinition.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$])
